code: import React from"react";import HighlightText from"../../../components/core/HomePage/HighlightText";import CTAButton from"../../../components/core/HomePage/Button";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LearningGridArray=[{order:-1,heading:"World-Class Learning for",highlightText:"Anyone, Anywhere",description:"Studypilot partners with more than 275+ leading universities and companies to bring flexible, affordable, job-relevant online learning to individuals and organizations worldwide.",BtnText:"Learn More",BtnLink:"/"},{order:1,heading:"Curriculum Based on Industry Needs",description:"Save time and money! The Belajar curriculum is made to be easier to understand and in line with industry needs."},{order:2,heading:"Our Learning Methods",description:"Studypilot partners with more than 275+ leading universities and companies to bring"},{order:3,heading:"Certification",description:"Studypilot partners with more than 275+ leading universities and companies to bring"},{order:4,heading:`Rating "Auto-grading"`,description:"Studypilot partners with more than 275+ leading universities and companies to bring"},{order:5,heading:"Ready to Work",description:"Studypilot partners with more than 275+ leading universities and companies to bring"}];const LearningGrid=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid mx-auto w-[350px] xl:w-fit grid-cols-1 xl:grid-cols-4 mb-12",children:LearningGridArray.map((card,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`${i===0&&"xl:col-span-2 xl:h-[294px]"}  ${card.order%2===1?"bg-richblack-700 h-[294px]":card.order%2===0?"bg-richblack-800 h-[294px]":"bg-transparent"} ${card.order===3&&"xl:col-start-2"}  `,children:card.order<0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"xl:w-[90%] flex flex-col gap-3 pb-10 xl:pb-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-4xl font-semibold ",children:[card.heading,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HighlightText,{text:card.highlightText})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-richblack-300 font-medium",children:card.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-fit mt-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CTAButton,{active:true,linkto:card.BtnLink,children:card.BtnText})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-8 flex flex-col gap-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-richblack-5 text-lg",children:card.heading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-richblack-300 font-medium",children:card.description})]})},i);})});};export default LearningGrid;
